article.title: Boeing to Modify AWACS for Japan Air Defense Force
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Boeing Company, Seattle, Washington, is being awarded a more than $35 million contract modification for modification of four Japan Airborne Warning and Control System aircraft on behalf of the Japan Air Defense Force.Â The Aerial Air Surveillance Systems Division, Hanscom Air Force Base, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity.
